mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD_INFO(BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, MEMBER_NO) VALUES (#{board.boardTitle}, #{board.boardContents}, #{memberNo})
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_ID, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENTS, B.MODIFY_DATE, B.LOOKUP_CNT, M.MEMBER_ID FROM TB_BOARD_INFO B JOIN TB_MEMBER_INFO M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
